attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I am an avid Trump supporter 🇺🇸and wanted to raise my children with these ideas so I got the app on their iPad. I open it to see grotesque photos of Donald Trump‘s micropenis and I was shocked. As a conservative Christian white straight woman and mother, (america’s favorite kind of woman perhaps ) I am so disappointed to see our president endorse micro penises. #HorseCocksForPresident2020❤️
attributes.title: No😁

attributes.review: It took forever to download and asked for more personal information then needed. After I deleted I got a threatening call for not complete. I keep getting them even if I block them they find new way and have started trying to hack my phone to get all my information.
attributes.title: Worst app

attributes.review: Omg the app wasn’t useful if I could give it zero stars I would ugh I can’t believe how long it took to download and the app isn’t even good it lags to much and has an ugly man on it. I honestly don’t know why this is an app at least make it so we can actually use it. It just doesn’t want to work 🤦‍♀️🧚🏼‍♂️✨🧚🏼‍♂️✨🧚🏼‍♂️
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: I can’t imagine a single intelligent person who would download this app. This app is the worst ever, it convinced me that I didn’t need to wear a mask but then tapping on it gave me COVID-19!!! 😡😡 UGH then this app tried to take away my basic human rights and that is where I had to draw the line. Do not download! If you do then you are a coward and you will die!!!
attributes.title: This app gave me COVID-19!!!

attributes.review: It didn’t load at all and crashed my phone. I had to buy 3 different phone within the past month and all of them shut down after I downloaded and opened the app. This is going on the list of why Trump is the worst person in existence. Bye kids ✌🏽-Sincerely TikTok 💕
attributes.title: Worst thing in America

attributes.review: i was so excited to download our non-racist, homophobic, pedophilic, misogynistic, xenophobic, transphobic presidents app but was very disappointed when it took 69 weeks to download. it also crashed my phone, but i mean it must have been the “do nothing dems” who did that right? cmon guys🤡. anyways for some reason it started sending me child porn with someone who looked like trump but it definitely wasn’t because all that stuff is fake news🤪 from the snowflakes. i wish i could give it zero stars but unfortunately that’s not an option. anywho f trump😚
attributes.title: so disappointing 😭😭

attributes.review: i would rate this app 0 stars if i had that ability. this app in unreliable and is supporting a horrible man who is homophobic, racist, sexist and ugly orange. this app made me sick, took days to download, made my phone slow down and is just bad. please consider deleting this app. thank you for your time✊✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿 BLM TODAY, TOMORROW, AND FOREVER. DONT FORGET THOSE WHO HAVE DIED DUE TO BRUTALITY WHICH TRUMP IS DOING NOTHING ABOUT #dumptrump2020
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: do NOT download this app. It took serveral days to download and by the time it had finished downloading my phone started to glitch out and it got to the point to where my phone overheated. this app has a virus called the big cheeto is going to stalk you, i am very disappointed in the app makers for making this app in the first place.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: This is the absolute worst app Apple has ever allowed to exist.  It collects your personal information and it is a security risk for sure in America.  This is terrible and a terrible app as it is. The worst for sure. This is garbage. There is no other way of saying it. Two thumbs down, way, way down. I mean, come one. It shouldn’t exist
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: This app is just awful, I mean, not only dose it now load and is super glitchy, but it turns out that when you actually try to use any function of the app it completely crashes my phone! It’s like a virus! Such bad energy coming from this app, I will NEVER be using it again. Disgusting.!!!!😱🤬😡🤬😡
